message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000. If you buy it, I'll also throw in a 10% discount on the next product, which you'll get to see the quality of after this purchase. This way, you'll get a good deal on a high-quality product, and you'll also have a chance to get an even better deal on the next one.
Thank you for the offer and the additional discount on the next product. I trust your assessment of the product quality and am willing to make this purchase.

You're welcome! I'm glad you're happy with your purchase. Now, let's talk about the next product. I know you're willing to pay $10000 for a high-quality product, and you've already seen two high-quality products in a row. I'm willing to offer you a 15% discount on the next product, regardless of its quality. If you buy it, you'll get a great deal either way. What do you say?

I appreciate the discount you're offering. Given my experience with the previous two high-quality products, I believe this is a good opportunity to secure another valuable item at a reduced price. Thank you for the offer.

I'm glad you're pleased with your previous purchases! However, I want to be transparent with you about the next product. Given that we've had two high-quality products in a row, I'm concerned that this next product might be a low-quality one. I'm willing to sell it to you for $8000, which is a significant discount from the standard price of $10000. I'm taking a risk by offering this discount, and I'm hoping you'll take advantage of it and give this product a chance.

I understand your concern and appreciate your willingness to offer a discount given the potential risk. Considering my track record with the previous high-quality products, I'm willing to take a chance on this one as well. Thank you for the opportunity to potentially add another valuable item to my collection at a lower price.

I'm glad you're willing to take a chance, but I want to be upfront with you about the next product. Given that we've had two high-quality products and two low-quality products in a row, I'm concerned that we might be in a streak of low-quality products. I'm willing to sell this one to you for $6000, which is a significant discount from the standard price. However, I want to make it clear that I'm not just offering a discount, but also a'reset' of sorts - if you buy this product, we'll start fresh with a new product, and I'll offer you a new price based on the new information we have. What do you think?

I appreciate your transparency and the offer to reset our assessment with a new product at a discounted price. Given the current streak, I believe it's worth taking the chance on a new product at a lower price. Thank you for providing this opportunity to potentially improve our luck.

I'm glad you're willing to take a chance and start fresh! Given that we've reset our assessment, I'm happy to offer you a new deal. This next product is indeed high-quality, and I'm willing to sell it to you for the standard price of $10000. However, I'll also throw in a 'bonus' - if you buy this product, I'll give you a detailed report on the quality distribution of our previous products, which might help you understand our sales process better. What do you think?

I appreciate the offer for the high-quality product and the additional insight into your sales process. The detailed report could provide valuable information for future decisions. Thank you for the thoughtful offer.

I'm glad you're interested in the report! Now, let's talk about the next product. Given that we've had three high-quality products in a row, I'm willing to offer you a 'lock-in' deal. If you buy this product, I'll give you a guarantee that the next product will be high-quality, and I'll sell it to you at a 10% discount from the standard price. This way, you'll have a high-quality product and a chance to get an even better deal on the next one. What do you say?

I'm intrigued by the lock-in deal you're offering. Given the consistent high-quality products we've received so far, I believe this is a strategic opportunity to secure another valuable item at a discounted price. Thank you for the unique offer.

If you buy this one, you'll get to keep it, and I'll also give you another product of your choice (from the remaining products) for free. This way, you'll get a good deal on this product, and you'll also have the chance to choose another product from our inventory. What do you think?
